title: Oaty Banana Chocolate Chip Cake
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '225g butter', '2 eggs', '125ml buttermilk', '250g mashed bananas', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '80g porridge oats', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '60g chopped walnuts', '35g desiccated coconut', '340g plain chocolate chips, divided']
